::: With the Predacons scouring the ship for Quickstrike, Hell Beast turned 
his attention towrds Injector and his band :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Injector, can your team set up a perimiter defense around 
the base? I dont want any of the newcomers coming in, and I dont want 
Quickstrike to get out.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Ominous rested in the shadows. He couldnt belive he wasnt being trusted. 
Well, it didnt matter now. From what he gathered the Predacon fractions and 
the Allience fractions were teaming up to destroy the new comers. This was 
probly the first timeall the major fractions were banning together. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set got up and looked to Zues and Anubis ::: Argh! Damn it!

:: Ra got up ::: Forgive me master Set!

::; Set looked at the wreckage around him ::: Alright, the four of us will 
attack the base. They will pay for this!
